Public Remarks: Own a piece of Chilliwack's history the Stonehurst. This historical home was built in 1909 by local resident Chauncey Eckert & fashioned from the Tudor Revival period, it was considered notable for it's architectural element & was considered a Grand Mansion built of stone. This 3 storey + basement home has 17 rooms & is just under 6000 sq. ft. The home holds most of its original character boasting oak/fir wood floors, grand wood mouldings/doors & mill work, detailed ceilings with intricate designs, original fireplace a separate servant staircase, oversized rooms, leaded & stained glass windows, screened porch off of master bed, large covered stone porch on front and back located on a .42 acre lot. Previously commercially zoned.

The french doors off the dining room open onto the private deck and back yard. 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms and a laundry on upper level. Fully developed basement completes the house, along with a beautifully landscaped property. Many updates including windows, bathrooms, roof, etc. Walking distance to Kitsilano Secondary,  recreation & shopping.

Development site can accommodate 4 single family homes with basement suites or 3 duplexes.  Survey & development plans available upon request. Property conveniently located walking distance to the sea bus, Lonsdale Quay, all the amenities of Central and Lower Lonsdale, the future Whole Foods Market and Ridgeway Elementary.    Easy access to public transportation and all levels of educational facilities.  Please don't walk the property.  Lot value, homes sold as is where is.

Public Remarks: Beautiful 5 bedroom Tudor family home on a lovely Shaughnessy Street. Private, sunny south exposure on a large 65' lot, x-hall plan with large living room, dining room and hardwood throughout. Central location, close to all amenities.

Stunning Classic Georgian home with cross hall living/dining on an expansive 9,466 sqft lot with 75 frontage. Massive principal rooms, with 5 bedrooms & den. Top of the line gourmet kitchen with family room leading onto sprawling decks and park like landscaping. This 4300 sqft home is an entertainer's dream with over 500 sqft of decks, built in BBQ and gas fire pit. Extensive upgrades, including newer 2/3 car garage. Fabulous master bdrm with ensuite, walking  closet & fireplace. Four generous bedrooms up with walk in closet and brand new shared bathroom with separate shower & free standing tub. Lower level features mudroom with ample closets, media room & gym. Open House July 16th, 2-4pm.

Public Remarks: Coal Harbour at its finest.  With over 3,000 sf of waterfront living, this home offers gracious living with large entertainment sized rooms.  The open living room and dining room offer waterfront views to Coal Harbour and the North Shore mountains.  The kitchen has been meticulously maintained with a large walk-in pantry and eating area, all adjacent to the family room.  The master suite is extra large and offering north to west waterfront views. Well thought out floorplan with his and her's den along with custom built-ins throughout.  An ensuite guest bedroom completes this special home.  Four side-by-side parking stalls and an extra large storage locker.

Public Remarks: Complete transformation to contemporary chic in this 3 level almost 6,000 square foot luxury home offering gorgeous views to the Ocean, Point Grey and UBC. Stunning street appeal leads you into this high quality full remodel designed for practical family living with amazing entertainment spaces. Few highlights include high end Kitchen and Wok Kitchen with top line Sub Zero and Wolf Appliances, spectacular master suite with luxurious ensuite, 7.1 surround sound media room, massive patio deck with glass railings, heated bathroom floors, all new electrical, metal roof, dance room or gym, feature wine cellar, designer fireplaces, new rock retaining walls and landscape and so much more! The home is also walking distance to Caulfeild Shopping Centre and Rockridge IB High School!

Public Remarks: Prime Dunbar location on flat 53' x 130' lot in a idyllic neighbourhood near Pacific Spirit Park. Charming 1950's bungalow, mechanically updated with many other improvements. Centrally located, close to St. George's school, Southlands Elementary and Lord Byng High School.

Public Remarks: This is it! A house built for the connoisseurs - Extremely high quality European home on serene quiet picture perfect setting in prime MH to grow your family in. Close to UBC, St George's, Pt Grey & Kerrisdale Elem.

Public Remarks: Beautiful Shaughnessy house located on Devonshire Crescent. Enter through solid wood doors into a spacious main living space featuring hardwood oak floors and a gas fire place. Three large bedrooms upstairs with a huge master bedroom and walk in closet. Close to great schools; a few blocks from York House, Little flower Academy & Vancouver College High school. All drain tiles completely redone, Roof less than five years old. Gorgeous landscape and fantastic rear lawn. Featuring double car garage accessible by lane with drive through access by the front.

Public Remarks: Spectacular custom home on a private, south facing lot in Upper Dundarave. Breathtaking ocean and city views. Exceptional quality throughout featuring a gorgeous kitchen with s/s appliances, teak cabinetry, limestone countertops, dramatic entertainment areas and formal living/dining rooms. Miles of wall space for art lovers, large picture windows, casual family room with built-in media center. Upperstairs features a beautiful master with spa-like ensuite + 3 additional bedrooms. Lower, full walk-out level includes a recreation room, games room, wine cellar and 5th bedroom. Oversized 2 car garage with large motor court, 5 zone air conditioning, Crestron automated music and lighting system and power shades in the master and Great Room. Minutes to all amenities.

The private pool deck and hot tub afford sweeping PANORAMIC ocean views from DOWNTOWN Van to Van Island. The 4 bdrm house is in great condition, perfect for any family and steps to #1 ranked Irwin Park Elem. This massive, 'UNICORN' lot could be the home of a brand new mansion of ~9,000 sq/ft that would easily be the CROWN JEWEL of Dundarave. Or, there is potential to SUBDIVIDE this into two ~8,500 sq/ft legal lots. This quiet, private, bright, sunny, south facing property has mature manicured gardens that are simply stunning. Truly ONE-OF-A-KIND. Open House Sunday July  10th, 2-5PM.

Public Remarks: Magnificent newer Shaughnessy home! This 5 bedrooms 5.5 bath home was built to exacting standards using the highest quality building materials. Designed in the French Provincial style, giving it a timeless look. This 'Green' home features radiant floor heating, air conditioning, solar power, multi stage drinking water filtration system, elevator, and a 60ft ozone indoor lap pool! The home features a 175 ft heated driveway, with gated access from Granville and the lane.

Public Remarks: Beautiful landscaping! Almost 6,000 sq.ft. exquisite family home location on a 11,867 sq.ft. level lot. The interior is finished to a high standard featuring gorgeous custom millwork. On the main level, an impressive layout that features a palatial two-storey vaulted great room, foyer, study, formal dining room and laundry room. The gourmet kitchen is designed around a 12' island and includes premium appliances. Library, master suite plus three ensuite bedrooms on the upper level. On the lower level you'll find a secondary laundry room, ensuite bedroom, full bar and games area, red velvet themed theatre and serene spa room. Arcon Rock and waterscape backyard. Close to school, shopping, UBC, airport and Richmond.

Super high ceiling on all three floors. Marble flooring, Spanish external wall tile, and Italian ceramic tile, gorgeous hand drawing ceiling. 6 bdrms and 7 bathrooms. Smart home, security system, audio surround system, crystal chandeliers, LED lights, HRV, AC. All carefully selected materials and quality workmanship made the best home. Close to BC top schools: Osler Elementary, Churchill Secondary, St. George's Crofton, West Point Grey, York House. Must see!

Live a great life with seawall steps away for walking, running or biking! Downtown shops and restaurants at your fingertips. 4 Parking (P1-#11, #30, #31, #32) SL #49.
